Articles.Content: Floor 485: Android hell

Floor 486 : A turret going to redemption saying :

"I'm different..."
Floor 487: The room is filled with large pipes ferrying blue, white, and orange liquids to the room above.
Floor 488 : Rainbow processing machine was once here, but we build a test chamber instead
Floor 489: Odd-looking boxlike turrets hopping around
Room 490: Teleport to room 404. There's also a teleport pad to here at room 404.
Room 491: A giant white pikmin is throwing a temper-tantrum, causing major damage in the room.

DP:

Room 492: A seemingly endless cornmaze, with the white pikmin from room 491 watching people get hopelessly lost in the maze.
Floor 493: You see Harry Kerman teach the members of Kermandore's Army how to do a Katronus.
Floor 494: You stop by a concession stand for some snacks
Floor 495: A endless spiral staircase.
Floor 496: A room aparently made of humain tissues

Floor 497: A sleeping egg zone, complete with egg holders and night caps for the eggs.

Oh, and a sign saying:

Congratulations! You've made it this far! A elevator is waiting for you at the next floor.

P.S: Do NOT wake up the eggs.
Floor 498: A good ol' fashioned rotten egg and tomato pelting of a politician.
Many of the old LT-1 landing legs, amassed in large groups around the room. (Good riddance to them!)
Floor 500: KSP Command pod mk1 and old engines memorials
Floor 501 : A miniature kerbin with a miniature KSC and a miniature tower with a miniature you at the floor 501
Floor 502: A simian assembly line.

Floor 503 : A big monitor whit white text on it :

Fourth wall structural intergrity : 0.8% and dropping...
Edited October 20, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse
Floor 504 : A mass of beams that reflect off of the mirror walls with minuscule beam collisions that look like bursts of fire.
Floor 505: A giant flatscreen TV with the channel H2 playing on it.
Floor 506: Welcome to my Plane of Oblivion.
Floor 507: Stanley worked in a big building on floor 507...
Floor 508: welcome to our nuclear test facility we added a few seconds ago wear some suits because it's going to be a blast on this floor in 10 seconds flat.
Floor 509: You feel the ground vibrate from an explosion in the floor below
